formElement.label: Configuration Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the configuration to be used. URL, port and credentials are retrieved from the given configuration. To view or create a new configuration, go to the Administration -> Plugins tab, and select 'Configure' action for @PLUGIN_KEY@ plugin.
formElement.htmlDocumentation:
Name of the configuration to be used. URL, port and credentials are retrieved from the given configuration.
A Configuration defines connection details and can be created by going to plugin configuration page.

formElement.label: StopNode Location:
formElement.documentation: Absolute Physical path in Filesystem to location of stopNode script i.e., /path/to/stopNode.sh or stopNode.bat

formElement.label: Node Profile:
formElement.documentation: Profile name of the Node which needs to be stopped. If this is not provided StopNode will stop the Node which has the default profile.

formElement.label: Log File Location:
formElement.documentation: Absolute Physical path in Filesystem to location of stopNode.sh logs i.e., /path/to/stopServer.log

formElement.label: Timeout:
formElement.documentation: Specifies the waiting time before node stop times out and returns an error.

formElement.label: Node Stop Policy:
formElement.documentation: Policy that will be used for node stopping. It could be one of: Just Stop node agent, stop Spplication Servers, Save Node State.

formElement.label: Additional Parameters:
formElement.documentation: This parameter can be used to either override defaults or pass Custom Properties. For example: -quiet, -nowait, -help.
